alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 20 at 10:42AM PST until January 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Del Norte County, and Northern Humboldt including the coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moderate to heavy periods of rainfall will fall on already saturated soils with total rainfall of 2 to 4 inches most likely. Rain rates could reach as high as 0.5 in/hr along the coast. Additional rainfall will is the expected by Monday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior
